name: Gone To Lunch
description:
Made the for the PHNX - Game Jam 2020. Theme: Research

Gone To Lunch is a puzzle game where you have to disarm a warhead, just another normal day in the explosive department.

Story:
You play as John, he works in the explosive department and it seems someone left post-it notes everywhere but you need to find out why. Do a little research will ya?

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move.
Left Click - Interact.
Right Click - Zoom.
